Articles.Content:
With reference to this thread

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42509-Recruiting-some-Modelers-and-Artists

And this thread

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43384-Recruiting-2-story-writers-for-a-storyline-mod%21

KerbTown Quest Pack (placeholder name) is looking for another member.

The programmer we were hoping to get politely turned down the offer, so that's that's opened up an amazing opportunity for some other lucky soul!

Someone with a fair amount of experience scripting with unity, and that can hold their own programming with C#

If your interested I'd like to ask for a demonstration scene scripted in unity for our lead programmer to take a look at.

We all work full time and are doing this in our spare time to make the game we all love so much just a little bit better, so as long as you have some free time to join in the group conversations on Skype, and can help us out with the coding were looking for you! (The more time the better, but hey, it's a game!)

Please reply here, or PM me. Skype will be required, as well as setting up an account on our private dev forum.

Thanks in advance!
Still nobody interested? If there's any interest you should message me, I'd be more than happy to let you in on what's going on!
Hey there, I am a 2nd years game development student and I'm quite interested, what are the requirements?
Sorry about the late reply, sent you a PM.
